post_text: Look what we found in the corner of the school pollinator garden! They are ready for loving homes. Unfortunately, the Athens Humane Society is inundated with too many kittens currently so it is up to us to find them a home. Mama cat needs a home too and would make an excellent barn cat. If someone is willing to foster/adopt Mama then the Humane Society can help with testing for Feline Leukemia, getting her spade, etc. A teacher has offered to help take care of the adoption fee. If you are able to invite any of these animals into your lives then please email Beth at bpettey@alexanderschools.org.
